thread.section_title: ShopTo.Net Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.shopto.net
thread.title: phillip joy

author: phillip joy
title: phillip joy
text:
The experience i've had with shopto was some of the easiest and professional I've dealt with.
They handled my issues effectively and quickly, ordering is never a chore and items are always received promptly and as I have stated, any issues are resolved better than a lot of other businesses you'll find.
I highly recommend them to anyone looking to purchase games/consoles/other items they provide for reasonable prices and very effective support. I can't think of a bad thing to say about them, by far the best games site available.
